channel.title: Toxicology; Metabolized
channel.description: A podcast about the helpful and harmful effects of drugs, plants, and any chemicallly active substance.
channel.itunes:author: Michael Chary

item.title: Mistletoe Toxicity (Episode 1)
item.itunes:author: Michael Chary
item.itunes:description:
1. BLUF:
  2. There are two types of mistletoe, American and European.
  3. Toxic vs Harmful

Notes for this episode: https://mac389.github.io/podcasts/2022-12-15-mistletoe/

item.title: Activated Charcoal
item.itunes:author: Michael Chary
item.itunes:description:
1. Activated charcoal decreases absorption from the GI tract.
  2. Activated charcoal is the most commonly used method of GI decontamination.
  3. Ways _not_ to prevent absorption.
  4. Activated charcoal can cause life-threatening inflammation of the lungs if it goes down the wrong tube.
  5. Questions.
  6. References

Notes for this episode: https://mac389.github.io/podcasts/2025-01-30-charcoal/
My Research Webpage: https://mac389.github.io
